name: HDLSmart
0:
”Alexa, set the light to 60 percent.”
”Alexa, turn on my lights.”
”Alexa, turn off my lights.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: "Please register your HDL account in Download On+App, and configure your device and scene, you can associate your HDL account in the Alexa App, and you can control HDL smart devices such as lights, blinds, fans, sockets and scenes through Alexa. It can maximize comfort and convenience, create an ideal atmosphere and satisfy your mood."
